name: CODING ROBO
description:
CODING ROBO is an educational game that teaches the basics of programming and algorithmic logic. It introduces the notions of sequential programming, loops and conditions. No prior knowledge of programming is required to play.

Our robots have been lost on this planet. Your mission is to bring them back!
Robots can be controlled by sending commands. Give your instructions, solve coding puzzles and send robots back to the earth.

Features

  • 30 unique levels
  • Challenging coding puzzles
  • Block-based programming
  • Tutorials
  • Level editor

Level Editor

Level Editor allows you to create your own levels with everything in CODING ROBO. You can create, share it with other players or even play/rate other levels created by players around the world.
